author: #s#8059
description:
The cog functions like the Manage Roles permission, but for specific to pairs of roles.
For example, one could allow role A to give role B to anyone else, but without allowing role A to give role C, D, etc.
install_msg: Hey there, thanks for installing my cog! I hope it will be useful. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to reach out!
short: Allow users with specific roles to give specified roles to other users
name: AssignRoles
